meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snappy.
meanings.sent1: Her snappiness in conversation always keeps things interesting.
meanings.sent2: I admire the snappiness of his wit during debates.
meanings.sent3: The snappiness of her comebacks always makes us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The snappiness of the music matched the dancer's quick movements.
meanings.sent5: The snappiness of the puppy's bark startled the birds nearby.

meanings.definition: A quick or sharp response or retort.
meanings.sent1: His snappiness caught everyone off guard in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but appreciate the snappiness of his comebacks.
meanings.sent3: The snappiness of his reply left us all speechless.
meanings.sent4: The snappiness of her tone cut through the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The snappiness of the teacher's correction made the students pay attention.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being lively or energetic.
meanings.sent1: The snappiness of the music had everyone on their feet.
meanings.sent2: I love the snappiness of her dance moves.
meanings.sent3: The snappiness of the party kept us all entertained.
meanings.sent4: The snappiness of his step showed his excitement.
meanings.sent5: The snappiness of the crowd added to the festive atmosphere.
